profile:
Having launched in 2013, and since weathered numerous provincial policy and regulatory changes that have threatened the industry, Polaron has endured as the largest residential solar company in Canada—with over 6,000installs across the nation.

Operating locally in British Columbia, Alberta, Ontario, Nova Scotia, and PEI, we offer all-inclusive packages that include design, financial planning, installation, and professional maintenance.

Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure that each step of the process gets completed with care and precision. You get the best quality solar panel system as well as maximum savings, thanks to our innovative program that makes solar more affordable than ever.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque and e-transfer. Financing Available.
licenses: CANREA, Efficiency Network, Solar Installers Canada, AP Systems Installer Canada
warranty_terms: Yes. 2 Years on Labour. 25 years Performance on Solar Panels.  20 Years on Micro-Inverter.

profile:
New Dawn Energy Solutions is  a team of engineers, electricians and entrepreneurs dedicated to integrating quality renewable energy systems using solar panels, inverters, wind turbines, batteries aimed at optimal energy production and delivering long term revenue performance through Micro FIT and Feed in Tariff programs or reducing the energy expenditures through Net metering programs for commercial, institutional and residential customers.

We take holistic approach in evaluating the energy need and recommend the most appropriate energy solutions to suite clients’ needs. Our services include Site Assessment, System design, solar panel installation, Micro Fit solar application, energy audit, Monitoring, Maintenance and Project Management. We have been in business since 2006 and offers proven experience, quality workmanship and professional services to each and every customer that exceed their expectation.

Solar PV, solar pool heater, small wind energy, energy Optimization, Energy Audit

profile:
Professional Site Assessment:
Herc Du Soleil solar designs maximize your dollar return. Our goal is to educate you so you can make an informed decision that suits your specific situation.
 
Maximizing Your Return on Investment:
Herc Du Soleil pays close attention to the details to ensure appealing aesthetics and a professional design. Our designs are guaranteed to generate the maximum return on your investment.
 
Up to Date Technologies:
Herc Du Soleil keeps up to date on the newest solar technologies.
 
We Do the Work:
Leave all of the paperwork to us. Rest assured we will take care of all required applications (OPA and LDC), engineering, permits (ESA), and all inspections.
 
 
Call or email Gopal for a free quote at 905-717-0321 or gopal@hercdusoleil.com!

profile:
Radiant Ready is a company with industry experience since 2001. As fully-certified professionals, we are ready to tackle anything from the most complex and large-scale radiant projects to the smallest of repair jobs. We are fuelled by our commitment to excellence and go the extra mile to make sure all of our clients are completely satisfied with our work. 

Radiant Ready is your one-stop shop for all your Radiant, Snow Melting, and repair needs. Whether you’re looking for help with something minor or need an experienced professional to take on a large-scale project — We are your go-to pro and we are ready to handle it all. Browse through the list of our services below, and get in touch for your free estimate.

Radiant Flooring
Our clients are priority number one. Have a specific project that requires professional attention, speed, and accuracy? Our Radiant Floor Installation services are well-honed to tackle even the most detailed projects. Providing comfort and value to your home/business. Contact us today to discover how Radiant Ready can help provide you with the service you require in the time needed

Snow Melting
Looking for a reliable Snow Melting Installer with decades of experience? We have earned a reputation for absolute customer satisfaction with our Hydronic Installation services. We offer Snow Melting Installation, Service, and Repair services at competitive rates, all whilst providing clients with personalized attention that is catered to their needs. Get in touch so we can get started right away.
